title: Document the new CopyField maxChars property in the example schema.xml
description: In this issue:  http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-538  a maxLength property was added to the copyField directive.  However, this is not documented in the example schema to make the feature known to users.

comments.author: Peter Wolanin
comments.content: needs work - the final format is maxChars NOT maxLength

comments.author: Peter Wolanin
comments.content: revised patch to use maxChars - still not sure if this is a useful example, but at least adds some documentation of this property.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content:
hl.maxAnalyzedChars is a better way to limit highlighting, right?
An example using both a dynamic copyfield and maxChars probably would be a good idea though (kill two birds with one stone).
